description: Definition of the AWS::QuickSight::RefreshSchedule Resource Type.

ScheduleId.description: An unique identifier for the refresh schedule.
ScheduleId.markdownDescription:
An unique identifier for the refresh schedule.

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 128 Update requires: No interruption

Interval.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: MINUTE15 | MINUTE30 | HOURLY | DAILY | WEEKLY | MONTHLY  
Update requires: No interruption

DayOfWeek.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SUNDAY | MONDAY | TUESDAY | WEDNESDAY | THURSDAY | FRIDAY | SATURDAY  
Update requires: No interruption

DayOfMonth.description: The Day Of Month for scheduled refresh.
DayOfMonth.markdownDescription:
The Day Of Month for scheduled refresh.

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 128 Update requires: No interruption

RefreshOnDay.markdownDescription:
The day scheduled for refresh.

--- Required: No Update requires: No interruption

TimeZone.markdownDescription:
The timezone for scheduled refresh.

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 128 Update requires: No interruption

TimeOfTheDay.description: The time of the day for scheduled refresh.
TimeOfTheDay.markdownDescription:
The time of the day for scheduled refresh.

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 128 Update requires: No interruption

ScheduleFrequency.markdownDescription:
Information about the schedule frequency.

--- Required: No Update requires: No interruption

StartAfterDateTime.description: The date time after which refresh is to be scheduled
StartAfterDateTime.markdownDescription:
The date time after which refresh is to be scheduled

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 1 Maximum Length: 128 Update requires: No interruption

RefreshType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: FULL_REFRESH | INCREMENTAL_REFRESH  
Update requires: No interruption

AwsAccountId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 12  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^[0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: Replacement

DataSetId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data source.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the data source.

--- Required: No Type: String Update requires: No interruption
